name: music-server
description: A means of serving music files over a local network, and a web app to control playback.
author: Ap0c

scripts.build-dev: rm -rf build/site-dev && mkdir -p build/site-dev/js && browserify js/controller.js > build/site-dev/js/app.js -d && cp html/index.html build/site-dev && cp -r css media build/site-dev
scripts.build: rm -rf build/site && mkdir -p build/site/js && browserify js/controller.js | uglifyjs > build/site/js/app.js && cp html/index.html build/site && cp -r css build/site
scripts.serve-dev: npm run build-dev && cd build/site-dev && http-server
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd build/site && http-server
scripts.test: rm -rf test/build && mkdir test/build && browserify test/testplayer.js > test/build/testplayer.js && open test/test.html
